module.name: qBTorrentsTrackers
module.short: Unit containing a container for torrent's trackers.

descr.p: This unit contains a set of objects that contain the torrent's trackers.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTracker
element.short: Container class for a single tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTracker.Url
element.short: The URL of the tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTracker.Status
element.short: The status of the tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTracker.NumPeers
element.short: Number of peers returned from tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTracker.Msg
element.short: Message of status from last call to tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTracker.Create
element.short: Creates the tracker object.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTracker.Create.aJSON
element.short: A JSON String contaning a JSON Object with a torrent's tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTracker.Create.aJSONData
element.short: A JSON Data contaning a torrent's tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTracker.Create.aJSONObj
element.short: A JSON Object contaning a torrent's tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTracker.Create.aStream
element.short: A TStream contaning a JSON Object with a torrent's tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTracker.Destroy
element.short: Destroys the object.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTracker.Load
element.short: Loads the contents of a torrent's tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTracker.Load.aJSON
element.short: A JSON String contaning a JSON Object with a torrent's tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTracker.Load.aJSONData
element.short: A JSON Data contaning a torrent's tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTracker.Load.aJSONObj
element.short: A JSON Object contaning a torrent's tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTracker.Load.aStream
element.short: A TStream contaning a JSON Object with a torrent's tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers
element.short: Container class for the torrent's trackers.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.Items
element.short: Property to access the list of TqBTorrentsTracker by index.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.Urls
element.short: Property to access the list of TqBTorrentsTracker by URL.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.GetEnumerator
element.short: Returns the enumerator class for this object.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.GetEnumerator.Result
element.short: The returned enumerator class for Trackers.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.LoadTrackers
element.short: Loads the contents of a series of trackers.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.LoadTrackers.aJSON
element.short: A JSON String containing an Array of trackers.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.LoadTrackers.aJSONData
element.short: A JSON Data containing the trackers.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.LoadTrackers.aJSONArray
element.short: A JSON Array containing the trackers.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.LoadTrackers.aStream
element.short: A TStream containing an Array of trackers.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.UpdateTrackers
element.short: Updates the contents of a series of trackers.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.UpdateTrackers.aJSON
element.short: A JSON String containing an Array of trackers.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.UpdateTrackers.aJSONData
element.short: A JSON Data containing the trackers.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.UpdateTrackers.aJSONArray
element.short: A JSON Array containing the trackers.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.UpdateTrackers.aStream
element.short: A TStream containing an Array of trackers.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.UpdateTracker
element.short: Updates the contents of a single trackers identified by a URL.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.UpdateTracker.aUrl
element.short: The url of the tracker to be updated.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.UpdateTracker.aJSON
element.short: A JSON String contaning a JSON Object with a torrent's tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.UpdateTracker.aJSONData
element.short: A JSON Data containing the trackers.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.UpdateTracker.aJSONObj
element.short: A JSON Object contaning a torrent's tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackers.UpdateTracker.aStream
element.short: A TStream contaning a JSON Object with a torrent's tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackersEnumerator
element.short: Implements the enumerator for Trackers.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackersEnumerator.Create
element.short: Creates the enumerator object.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackersEnumerator.Create.ATrackers
element.short: The object containing the Trackers list.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackersEnumerator.GetCurrent
element.short: Returns the current Tracker in the enumerator.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackersEnumerator.GetCurrent.Result
element.short: The returned current Tracker.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackersEnumerator.MoveNext
element.short: Tries to move to the next Tracker, returning False if end reached.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackersEnumerator.MoveNext.Result
element.short: Returns True if moved to next, False if reached end of list.

element.name: TqBTorrentsTrackersEnumerator.Current
element.short: Property containing the current Tracker on the enumerator.

element.name: StrToqBTrackerStatus
element.short: Translates from String to TqBTrackerStatus.

element.name: StrToqBTrackerStatus.aStatus
element.short: The String to be translated.

element.name: StrToqBTrackerStatus.Result
element.short: The translated TqBTrackerStatus.

element.name: qBTrackerStatusToStr
element.short: Translates from TqBTrackerStatus to String.

element.name: qBTrackerStatusToStr.aStatus
element.short: The TqBTrackerStatus to be translated.

element.name: qBTrackerStatusToStr.Result
element.short: The translated String.
